text.section: A majority of the members then serving on a committee is a quorum.

section.section: Each committee shall meet at least once every 3 months.

The meetings of each committee shall be held:
in a State correctional facility in a space designated by the managing official of the facility; or
if a State correctional facility is being planned, in a location accessible to the members of the committee.

text.section: A member of a committee may not receive compensation.
